statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_id, complaint FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_date, complaint, customer_id FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, complaint FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id > 100 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, count(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING count(feedback_id) > 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(feedback_id) AS total_sum FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sum > 100 ORDER BY total_sum DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, complaint_text FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_name='Alice' AND complaint_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM CustomerComplaints;
SELECT customer_name, complaint_text FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE complaint_text LIKE '%refund%';
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, complaint_text FROM CustomerComplaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_category, feedback_text FROM RegulatoryFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints JOIN RegulatoryFeedback ON CustomerComplaints.complaint_id = RegulatoryFeedback.feedback_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(complaint_id) AS num_complaints FROM CustomerComplaints GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(complaint_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text FROM Customer_Complaints WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, timestamp FROM Customer_Feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM Customer_Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Regulatory_Compliance WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text FROM Customer_Complaints WHERE complaint_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM Customer_Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT compliance_id, complaint_id, feedback_id, compliance_status FROM Regulatory_Compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, complaint_text, timestamp FROM Customer_Complaints ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating, timestamp FROM Customer_Feedback WHERE rating < 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM Customers ORDER BY contact_number DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT body_name, body_type, location FROM RegulatoryBodies ORDER BY body_type ASC, location DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE contact_number = '1234567890';
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01' AND complaint_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT body_name, location FROM RegulatoryBodies WHERE body_type = 'Government';
SELECT issue_description FROM ComplianceIssues WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, r.body_name FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Complaints cm ON c.customer_id = cm.customer_id INNER JOIN ComplianceIssues ci ON cm.complaint_id = ci.complaint_id INNER JOIN RegulatoryBodies r ON ci.body_id = r.body_id WHERE cm.complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text FROM complaints WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, complaint_text FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT complaint_id, customer_id, complaint_text FROM complaints WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date
